SEARCH
Package simu.model

Class ServicePoint

java.lang.Object
simu.model.ServicePoint
public class ServicePoint extends Object
Represents a service point in the simulation. Each service point has one or more queues where passengers wait, and servers that process them. It also tracks statistics such as maximum and average queue lengths.

  • Constructor Details

    • ServicePoint

      public ServicePoint(ContinuousGenerator generator, EventList eventList, EventType type, int lineCount)
      Create the service point with the given number of queues.
      Parameters:
      generator - random number generator for service time simulation
      eventList - simulator event list, needed for inserting service completion events
      type - event type for the service end event
      lineCount - number of lines in this service point
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if lineCount invalid input: '<'= 0

  • Method Details

    • addQueue

      public void addQueue(Passenger a)
      Add a passenger to the shortest available queue.
      Parameters:
      a - passenger to be queued

    • removeQueue

      public Passenger removeQueue()
      Remove a passenger from the longest queue. Updates statistics as well.
      Returns:
      passenger retrieved from the waiting queue, or null if all queues are empty

    • beginService

      public void beginService(int lineIndex)
      Begins a new service on the given queue index. Marks the line as reserved and schedules a completion event.
      Parameters:
      lineIndex - index of the queue to serve

    • isReserved

      public boolean isReserved(int lineIndex)
      Check whether the given line is currently reserved (busy).
      Parameters:
      lineIndex - index of the queue
      Returns:
      true if reserved, false otherwise

    • isOnQueue

      public boolean isOnQueue(int lineIndex)
      Check whether there are passengers waiting in the given queue.
      Parameters:
      lineIndex - index of the queue
      Returns:
      true if the queue has passengers, false otherwise

    • isQueueEmpty

      public boolean isQueueEmpty(int lineIndex)
      Check whether the given queue is empty.
      Parameters:
      lineIndex - index of the queue
      Returns:
      true if empty, false otherwise

    • sampleAllQueues

      public void sampleAllQueues()
      Samples the length of all queues and updates statistics.

    • getLineCount

      public int getLineCount()
      Get the number of lines (queues) in the service point.
      Returns:
      number of lines

    • getMaxLength

      public int getMaxLength()
      Get the maximum observed queue length.
      Returns:
      maximum queue length, or 0 if no samples exist

    • getAverageLength

      public double getAverageLength()
      Get the average queue length across all samples.
      Returns:
      average queue length, or 0.0 if no samples exist
